content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created. I received a command to browse the website https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page and find out the current featured articles. I successfully gathered the answer that the current featured article is about the short-beaked echidna, a species of echidna found in Australia and eastern New Guinea. The article also discusses its behavior, mating habits, and threats to its population. Other sections of the page include news updates, recently featured articles, and information about Wikipedia itself.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "featured_article.txt", "text": "The current featured article on Wikipedia is about the short-beaked echidna, a species of echidna found in Australia and eastern New Guinea. It is covered in fur and spines, has a distinctive snout, and uses a specialized tongue to catch insects. The article also discusses its behavior, mating habits, and threats to its population. Other sections of the page include news updates, recently featured articles, and information about Wikipedia itself."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
